mapper.select: select ID, tenant_id, config_name, config_key, config_value, config_desc, create_time, last_update_time from sys_param_config where ID = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into sys_param_config(tenant_id, config_name, config_key, config_value, config_desc, create_time, last_update_time) values (#{tenantId}, #{configName}, #{configKey}, #{configValue}, #{configDesc}, #{createTime}, #{lastUpdateTime})

insert into sys_param_config(tenant_id, config_name, config_key, config_value, config_desc, create_time, last_update_time) values
(#{entity.tenantId}, #{entity.configName}, #{entity.configKey}, #{entity.configValue}, #{entity.configDesc}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.lastUpdateTime})

insert into sys_param_config(tenant_id, config_name, config_key, config_value, config_desc, create_time, last_update_time) values
(#{entity.tenantId}, #{entity.configName}, #{entity.configKey}, #{entity.configValue}, #{entity.configDesc}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.lastUpdateTime})
on duplicate key update tenant_id = values(tenant_id), config_name = values(config_name), config_key = values(config_key), config_value = values(config_value), config_desc = values(config_desc), create_time = values(create_time), last_update_time = values(last_update_time)
mapper.update:
update sys_param_config
tenant_id = #{tenantId},
config_name = #{configName},
config_key = #{configKey},
config_value = #{configValue},
config_desc = #{configDesc},
create_time = #{createTime},
last_update_time = #{lastUpdateTime},
where ID = #{id}
